<mxGeometry x="33.5" width="160" height="40" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="eskrxKaJawbwdmoqFCWR-19" value="<div style="text-align: left;"><div><font style="font-size: 9px;" face="Courier New">{</font></div><div><font style="font-size: 9px;" face="Courier New">&nbsp; "task_id": "BOTTE_MESSAGE",</font></div><div><font style="font-size: 9px;" face="Courier New">&nbsp; "sender_app": "CONTABEL",</font></div><div><font style="font-size: 9px;" face="Courier New">&nbsp; "payload": {"text": "Hello!"}</font></div><div><font style="font-size: 9px;" face="Courier New">}</font></div></div>" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;fontColor=#B3B3B3;labelBackgroundColor=none;" left;"><div><div><font face="Courier New">{</font></div><div><font face="Courier New">&nbsp; "text": "Hello World",</font></div><div><font face="Courier New"><font>&nbsp;&nbsp;</font><span style="background-color: transparent;"># Optional.</span></font></div><div><font face="Courier New">&nbsp; "sender_app": "CONTABEL"&nbsp;</font></div><div><font face="Courier New">}</font></div></div></div>" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;fontColor=#FFFFFF;labelBackgroundColor=none;fontSize=9;"
